name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese, and combine with pasta and pancetta.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian curry dish with roasted chicken chunks in a spicy sauce.
ingredients: 1 tbsp each of garam masala, turmeric, cumin
instructions: Marinate and roast chicken. Cook sauce with tomatoes and spices. Combine chicken with sauce.
details: difficulty: Medium | rating: 4.7 | time: 2 hrs 40 min

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A Russian dish of saut√©ed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).
instructions: Saute beef and onions. Add mushrooms. Stir in sour cream and mustard. Serve over rice or noodles.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
instructions: Mix lettuce, croutons, and cheese. Add dressing and toss the salad.

name: Pad Thai
description: A stir-fried rice noodle dish commonly served as a street food and at casual local eateries in Thailand.
instructions: Stir-fry tofu and shrimp. Add noodles and sauce. Mix in eggs, bean sprouts, and peanuts.

name: Fish Tacos
description: A Mexican dish consisting of grilled or fried fish, lettuce or cabbage, pico de gallo, and a creamy sauce, all placed on top of a corn or flour tortilla.
instructions: Grill or fry fish. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, avocado, and sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A typical Neapolitan pizza, made with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.
instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Top with cheese and basil. Bake in a preheated oven.
details: difficulty: Easy | rating: 4.6 | time: 1 hr 10 min

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and easy dish consisting of various vegetables stir-fried in a light sauce.
ingredients: 500g Mixed Vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in oil with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and cook until tender.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
description: A creamy soup made from butternut squash, onions, and a blend of spices, often enjoyed in the fall.
ingredients: 1 large peeled and cubed Butternut Squash
instructions: Cook squash and onions in stock until soft. Blend until smooth. Add cream and nutmeg.

name: Chocolate Brownies
description: A dense, rich, chocolate cake which is, in texture, like a cross between a cake and a cookie.
instructions: Mix butter, sugar, and eggs. Add flour and cocoa powder. Fold in chocolate chips. Bake.

name: Vegan Chili
description: A hearty and flavorful chili made with a variety of beans, vegetables, and spices.
instructions: Saute onions and bell peppers. Add garlic, beans, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
description: A nutritious and refreshing salad combining quinoa, black beans, and a variety of vegetables.
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with black beans, bell peppers, corn, and avocado. Dress with lime juice, olive oil, cilantro, salt, and pepper.

name: Vegan Mushroom Stroganoff
description: A creamy and savory stroganoff made with mushrooms and a rich vegan sauce.
instructions: Saute mushrooms, onion, and garlic. Add soy sauce, cream, paprika. Simmer. Serve over cooked pasta.

name: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: A rich and hearty lasagna layered with a variety of cheeses, spinach, and marinara sauce.
instructions: Cook noodles. Mix ricotta, egg, garlic, salt, and pepper. Layer noodles, cheese mixture, spinach, marinara sauce, and mozzarella. Bake.
details: difficulty: Medium | rating: 4.7 | time: 1 hr 30 min

name: Caprese Salad
description: A simple Italian salad, made of sliced fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and sweet basil, seasoned with salt, and olive oil.
instructions: Layer alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella. Add basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze. Season.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy Italian rice dish cooked with a variety of mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Saute mushrooms, onion, garlic. Add rice, cook until translucent. Gradually add stock, stirring. Finish with parmesan.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: A French stew prepared with beef braised in red wine, often red Burgundy, and beef broth, flavored with carrots, onions, garlic, and a bouquet garni, with pearl onions and mushrooms.
instructions: Brown beef. Set aside. Cook vegetables. Add flour, wine, broth, beef, and bouquet garni. Simmer until beef is tender.

name: Pork Adobo
description: A popular Filipino dish and cooking process in Filipino cuisine that involves meat, seafood, or vegetables marinated in vinegar, soy sauce, and garlic, which is browned in oil, and simmered in the marinade.
instructions: Marinate pork in soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, peppercorns, and bay leaves. Brown pork in oil. Add marinade and simmer until tender.
details: difficulty: Medium | rating: 4.8 | time: 1 hr 20 min

name: Classic Roast Chicken
description: A whole chicken roasted with herbs, butter, and lemon, resulting in crispy skin and juicy meat.
instructions: Rub chicken with butter, lemon, and herbs. Place garlic inside cavity. Roast until golden.
details: difficulty: Easy | rating: 4.7 | time: 1 hr 30 min

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter Sauce
description: Tender grilled salmon fillets are topped with a zesty lemon herb butter sauce.
instructions: Grill salmon with olive oil, salt, and pepper. In a pan, melt butter and add lemon juice, zest, dill, and parsley. Pour over salmon to serve.
